channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Media Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Media Server

item.title: CVE-2021-33180|2024-09-17T03:34:27.324Z -- synology -- synology%20media%20server
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an SQL command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in cgi component in Synology Media Server before 1.8.1-2876 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.
